perturbation.original_text:
8.
Exclusivity. Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or
make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other multivitamin.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.
Exclusivity. Celebrity represents and warrants that during the Term and in the Territory, Celebrity will not endorse or
make any appearances or advertisements on behalf of any other multivitamin product line which directly competes with Clotamin.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause prohibits endorsing any multivitamin. The modified clause narrows the restriction to only competing multivitamin product lines. This creates a contradiction because it is unclear whether the celebrity can endorse a multivitamin that doesn't directly compete with Clotamin.

perturbation.original_text:
10. Termination

A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Celebrity in
the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other
covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of
written notice. Such termination shall relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration
pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
10. Termination

A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Celebrity in
the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other
covenant or agreement set forth herein. Such termination shall relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement, unless the breach was related to Paragraph 4, in which case HDS remains obligated to pay a pro-rata amount of the Cash Payment described in section 5.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that HDS is relieved of all further consideration upon termination due to Celebrity's breach. The modified clause introduces an exception where HDS remains obligated for a pro-rata payment if the breach relates to the duties in Paragraph 4. This creates a contradiction because it's unclear whether HDS is entirely relieved of financial obligation or only partially, depending on the nature of the breach.

perturbation.original_text:
14. Insurance. HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages:

A. Commercial General Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per occurrence
and $2,000,000 aggregate.

B.
Umbrella / Excess Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 per
occurrence and aggregate.

C.
Media Liability insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.

The Celebrity shall be named as an additional insured on coverages A, B and C. Celebrity is afforded waiver of
subrogation on coverages A, B and C. All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of
cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity’s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance
within five (5) days of its request for same.
perturbation.changed_text:
14. Insurance. HDS agrees to provide and maintain at its own expense, the following insurance coverages:

A. Commercial General Liability coverage of product liability with limits no less than $1,000,000 per occurrence
and $2,000,000 aggregate.

B.
Umbrella / Excess Liability coverage inclusive of product liability with limits not less than $5,000,000 per
occurrence and aggregate.

C.
Media Liability insurance with limits not less than $2,000,000 per occurrence and aggregate.

The Celebrity shall be named as an additional insured on coverages A and B only. Celebrity is afforded waiver of
subrogation on coverages A, B and C. All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of
cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity’s agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance
within five (5) days of its request for same.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates Celebrity be named as additional insured on A, B, and C. The changed text states that celebrity is named only on A and B. Then the very next sentence says that celebrity is afforded waiver of subrogation on coverages A, B and C. This creates ambiguity because it is unclear whether coverage C applies for Celebrity as an additional insured or not.
